Your case {{CaseID}} has been approved after review. You may proceed with the next steps outlined in your compliance workflow.

 

Please note:
Even though the case is approved, if intake is not completed or violations are not resolved by the SLA deadline, automation will enforce the policy action associated with the assigned risk level.

If all intake requirements and violations have already been completed, no further action is required other than continuing to comply with company policy.

 

Next steps:

  • Complete any remaining intake requirements promptly.
  • Address all identified violations and confirm remediation.
  • Monitor the SLA timeline to avoid automated enforcement.

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter. Timely compliance ensures smooth operations and minimizes risk exposure.

 

— The Copilot Studio Compliance Team
